name: GDBUtil

screenshots.caption: GDBUtil working with two databases, consoles and some views

short_description: The Generic Database Utility - GDBUtil - is a highly configurable database browsing tool using jdbc. A simple database console is provided for ad hoc queries. GDBUtil is realized as an Eclipse 3.4 RCP application.
